marklogic.body:
I too have seen 9mm bullet wounds, fairly fresh. No, they do not Bleed a torrent of blood unless its a head shot. Very often the entrance wound is sometimes imperceptible and what little blood does come out is very often absorbed by clothing. Much of the Bleeding takes place internally, not to be sure, but more often than you think. I think even when Reagan was shot, the Secret Service didn't realize it until he began vomitting blood.
edit; I was just remembering we have that freeway shooting incident, (and others), where people didn't even realize they had been shot until much later....they just heard a noise and felt some sharp pain, but couldn't fathom it was actually a gunshot.
